pluginstrument.author: Simstrumetation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://github.com/simstrumentation
Main electrical switch panel for the Daher Kodiak by SimWorks Studios.
NOTE: 3-position switches (fuel pump and starter) are activated by touching on the labels above and below the switches and not on the switch itself.
